snippet: China’s most celebrated director, Zhang Yimou, could face a hefty fine if he is found to have fathered more children than allowed by law.
abstract: Zhang Yimou, China's most celebrated filmmaker, is being investigated for potential violation of family planning laws restricting families to one child; Zhang is suspected of having fathered up to seven children with four women, and may be fined nearly $27 million if found guilty.
lead_paragraph: China’s most celebrated director, Zhang Yimou, could face a hefty fine if he is found to have fathered more children than allowed by law.

headline.seo: Zhang Yimou, Chinese Filmmaker, Investigated in Family Planning Case
headline.main: Chinese Filmmaker Is Investigated by Family Planning Officials
